CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 2, 1960, pg. A8, reads: "Wed 45 Years - Mr. and Mrs. Charles H. Harper, 713 Clarissa St., celebrated their 45th wedding anniversary Dec. 27 at home with a quiet family dinner. Five of their seven children were present: Mrs. Wilda Griffin, Mrs. Doris Griffin, Charles Jr., Nathaniel and Walter Harper, the bandleader. They received greetings from a daughter, Mrs. Alice Ellis in Newark, N. J., and a son Ernest, in Chicago. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Lucinda Harper and Charles H. Harper Sr. on their 45th wedding anniversary in their home at 713 Clarissa Street, Upper Hill District
